item.title: asst2
item.description:
C++ Sync threadçš„ä½¿ç”¨ #include <thread> #include <stdio.h> void my_func(int thread_id, int num_threads) { printf("Hello from spawned thread %d of %d
", thread_id, num_threads); } int main(int argc, char** argv) { std::thread t0 = std::thread(my_func, 0, 2); std::thread t1 = std::thread(my_func, 1, 2); printf("The main thread is running concurrently with spawned threads.
"); t0.join(); t1.join(); printf("Spawned threads have terminated at this point.
"); return 0; }
